title: High-End Historical Stay in the #1 Rated Hotel in Normandyâ€™s Capital
description: Discover the history and glittering architecture of Normandy, staying in its stunning capital, Rouen, at the #1 hotel as rated on TripAdvisor. Indulge in a romantic, five-star French getaway staying at Hotel de Bourgtheroulde, Autograph Collection - a boutique hotel in a striking 15th-century building sitting just steps from the city centre. Includes daily buffet breakfast, a welcome glass of champagne or beer, access to the spa, a tourist pass for the Joan of Arc museum and more.
offer_address: 15 Pl. de la Pucelle, 76000 Rouen, France
